verbose_text: An additional analysis was performed by considering the period of April 1-15, 2020, during which the strongest lockdown measures were applied (XREF_FIG), which led to the discovery of reductions in NO 2 of -35.0% in Guayaquil and -23.4% in Quito (data not shown).
evidence: April 1-15, 2020, during which the strongest lockdown measures were applied ( XREF_FIG ), which led to the discovery of reductions in NO
